name: TinyCrayon
summary: TinyCrayon is an easy way to create a UIViewController for interactive image cutout and masking.
description:
TinyCrayon is a mobile SDK that you can use to create a UIViewController for image cutout and masking. It provides three tools:
* Quick Select Tool: It's a tool with auto edge detection and can help user to select a object in an image
* Hari Brush Tool: It's a tool with soft image matting techniques which can help user to select hair and fur in an image
* Brush Tool: It's a regular brush which user can use to draw on an image
